Here are the extracted sentences that meet the criteria:

Inhibition of prolyl tRNA synthetase activity was determined with triplicate determinations at the indicated concentrations of proline, and 1 nM (no inhibition compared to 0 nM, used for purposes of log plot), 40 nM, 80 nM, 160 nM, 240 nM, 320 nM, and 480 nM concentrations of HF.
IC50 values for HF at proline concentrations of 20, 60, 180, and 480 μΜ were determined as shown in Figure 12, Km (Προ) and Et values were determined as shown in Figure 10.
MEFs were incubated with the indicated concentration of HF in the presence or absence of 2 mM proline for 2 hours, washed twice in cold PBS, and lysed in 1% NP40, and then tested for HF levels in comparison to a standard curve using known concentrations of HF with an anti-HF antibody based ELISA assay.
MEFs growing in DME/10% FCS were treated with 100 nM HF or 0.5 μΜ rapamycin and analyzed by Western blot for phosphorylation of component of the mTor signaling pathway.
